newFeatures.title: Hello world!
newFeatures.body: This is a hello world body!

bugFixes.text: Fix hyrax-docker to work with hyrax 1.15.x
hyrax-dependencies on the web site are out of date
The current BES RPM package installs with MDS unwritable
Test the automatically generated RPM and debian packages
Server side function roi() is failing on datasets with more than 2 dimensions
NcML needs to support changing dimension names.
NcML needs to support changing variable names in aggregations.
URS authentication error during initial access
Add BES Debian package build to the BES CI process
Build an initial version of the BALTO broker for two different data source types: Hyrax and Files accessible using HTTP
'Too Many Open Files' error when the DMR++ handler is run on many variables (60+), or for many repetitions (60+)
There are a number of segmentation faults in the DMR++ software for large runs
DMR++ modules needs to fix 'string throws.'
